name: misty-terrain
flavor_text: This protects Pokémon on the ground from status conditions and halves damage from Dragon-type moves for five turns.
effect_text_extend:
For five turns, protects all Pokémon on the ground from major status ailments and confusion and weakens dragon moves used against them to 0.5× their power.

Changes nature power to moonblast.
effect_text_simple: For five turns, protects all Pokémon on the ground from major status ailments and confusion, and halves the power of incoming dragon moves.
